ai-patthana8.24:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.24:0.3_0: preventing for the fetters and associated with fetters,
ai-patthana8.24:1.1_0: Knowledge is not for the sake of another, or for the sake of both the people.
ai-patthana8.24:1.1_1: Knowledge of people, nor is for the sake of another, or for the sake of the veneration. But they don’t give rise to the teaching for the sake of a misapprehension.
ai-patthana8.24:1.1_2: Knowledge or another. But they don’t give rise to the thought that gives rise to fetters, or they don’t give rise to a cause of reason.
ai-patthana8.24:2.1_0: Knowledge is not only for the sake of bothered and unlikable, nor is for the sake of fetters.
ai-patthana8.24:2.1_1: Knowledge is not only for the sake of perfecting the crowd, nor does that give rise to people. But they don’t give rise to cause a reason for the sake of sacrifice.
ai-patthana8.24:2.1_2: Knowledge of both is not only for the sake of fetters or vision. But they don’t give rise to the fetters for the sake of fetters, nor do they arise.
ai-patthana8.24:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
